mapper.select: select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id WHERE e.identity_type!='DECORATE_MANAGER' AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.emp_id = #{id} order by emp_id asc

select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.store_id = #{storeId} AND e.identity_type='SELLER' order by emp_id asc
select DISTINCT e.identity_type from emp_employee e WHERE e.store_id=#{storeId} AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_MANAGER' AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc
select DISTINCT e.identity_type from emp_employee e WHERE e.city_id=#{cityId} AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_MANAGER' AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc
select DISTINCT e.identity_type from emp_employee e WHERE e.identity_type!='DECORATE_MANAGER' AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc

select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.store_id = #{storeId} AND e.identity_type=#{identityType} order by emp_id asc

select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_MANAGER' AND e.identity_type!='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc

select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id WHERE e.identity_type='DECORATE_MANAGER' OR e.identity_type='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE' order by emp_id asc

select e.emp_id,e.login_name,e.name,e.identity_type,e.status,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where (e.name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%')) AND (e.identity_type='DECORATE_MANAGER' OR e.identity_type='DECORATE_EMPLOYEE') order by emp_id asc

select e.login_name ,e.name,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id, s.store_name,e.emp_id,ecm.id,ecm.credit_limit_available,ecm.temp_credit_limit from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id RIGHT JOIN emp_credit_money ecm ON e.emp_id =ecm.emp_id ORDER BY ecm.id ASC

select e.login_name ,e.name,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id, s.store_name,e.emp_id,ecm.id,ecm.credit_limit,ecm.temp_credit_limit,ecm.credit_limit_available,ecm.last_update_time from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id RIGHT JOIN emp_credit_money ecm ON e.emp_id =ecm.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{id}

select e.login_name ,e.name,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id, s.store_name,e.emp_id,ecm.id,ecm.credit_limit_available,ecm.temp_credit_limit from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id RIGHT JOIN emp_credit_money ecm ON e.emp_id =ecm.emp_id WHERE e.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryGuideVOByInfo},'%') OR e.name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryGuideVOByInfo},'%') ORDER BY ecm.id ASC
